jobs.title: Freelance Frontend developer
responsibilities: Developed dynamic web dashboards with Flask, JavaScript, Bulma, Sass and Plotly. Included ROAS charts, maps, CPM and more for data-rich, user-friendly experiences.
Working collaboratively with a UI/UX designer to translate design concepts into fully functional dashboards, ensuring a cohesive and user-centric interface.
Developed an internal publisher tool that enables team non-developers to update and edit publisher data easily.

jobs.title: Frontend developer
responsibilities: Contributing to the development and improvement of the Decibel app from its first version to Decibel Version 3. Leveraged modern technologies like React, Unstated-Next, TypeScript and Netlify to deliver exceptional user experiences.
Implemented responsive design, making the Decibel app fully compatible and user-friendly across mobile devices.
Designed and built new flow steps, including Geo search, Dayparting selector, and reusable design components, enhancing ad creation capabilities.
Developed and deployed user authentication features, including a robust password reset functionality, utilizing Firebase, enhancing security and user convenience.
Developed and Embedded a forecasting tool and example audio ads library into the landing page, increasing traffic and engagement.

Created an independent 'Try it out' section on the new landing page, providing users with a preview of 27 types of ads. Leveraged Firebase storage to enable this feature without requiring users to create a campaign.
Analyzed user data and implemented strategies to reduce user drop-off, improving user retention and engagement.

jobs.title: Intern Frontend developer
responsibilities: Assisted designing the school website with HTML, JavaScript, jQuery and Bootstrap.
Implemented new content on the landing page for the customer-facing application and bug fixes for the existing bugs.

projects.name: Wontify
projects.technologies: React.js, TypeScript, Material-UI, Styled-components, Redux-toolkit, Express, MongoDB, Netlify
descriptions: Assisted designing the school website with HTML, JavaScript, jQuery and Bootstrap.
